data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe a time you collaborated on something.
data.answer: I collaborated with my friend John on a group presentation for an English course. We were paired by the teacher. At first, we thought this is not going to work as we are both weak at giving a presentation. However, after working together, we started to find a way to do this. I enjoyed collaborating with him because he always makes a plan beforehand and listens to my opinion carefully before he presents his own ideas. We engaged in meaningful discussion and argument about how to do this presentation. The result is a huge success. Therefore, it is important to learn how to collaborate with others.

options.content: Do you enjoy collaborating with others?
